DOC.brief_summary: Open label , non-randomized , multi-center , within-subject comparative study evaluate tolerability diagnostic utility Lymphoseek compare VBD pediatric subject melanoma , rhabdomyosarcoma , solid tumor . Subject age range neonatal 17 year .
